Tahir Hemphill (amụrụ n'ubochí irí na anọ n'ọnwa, 1972) bụ ónyé America na-ese ihe nkírí multimedia, ethnolinguist, na ónyé na-eme nchọpụta
Ọ mepụtara nchekwa data Hip Hop Word Count.
Hemphill tolitere na New York City, na mpaghara Lower East Side
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Brooklyn Technical High School na Regents diploma concentration na Electrical Engineering. Ọ bụ ónyé Africa America.
Hemphill gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Morehouse College na B.A
O nwere asambodo na Strategic Planning site na Miami Ad School
O nwéré nzèrè masta na Communications Design nkè ọ natara na Pratt Institute.
Hemphill mepụtara nchekwa data ethnographic nke abụ hip-hop na-ekpuchi ógè site na 1979 ruo ugbu a. N'ime nchekwa data, a na-etinye ihe onwunwe na ụbọchị dịka ụbọchị ntọhapụ album si dị
Hemphill na-akpọ data a geography nke asụsụ na mbara igwe nke hip-hop

Hemphill kọwapụtara ozi ahụ site na nyocha nke ọnụ ọgụgụ okwu, ọnụ ọgụgụ nke mkpụrụ édémédé kwà okwu, ọnụego mkpụrụedemede ọ bụla, okwu polysyllabic, yana agụmakwụkwọ na ọkwa ọgụgụ ndị na-ege ntị. Hemphill jiri Simplified Measure of Gobbledygook ("SMOG") na FleschãoKincaid readability tests (nke ónyé na-akwado Bekee Rudolf Flesch mepụtara) iji nyochaa ọkwa ọgụgụ. N'ime nyocha ya banyéré Hip-Hop site na oghere sayensị, ọ na-ezube ịchọpụta mmalite nke okwu ụfọdụ, otu ha si aga n'ọbọdọ dị íchè íchè, na nkọwa ha na-agbanwe agbanwe n'ọnọdụ dị íchè íchè.
